description: [Mispadu](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1122) can monitor browser activity for online banking actions and display full-screen overlay images to block user access to the intended site or present additional data fields.(Citation: Segurança Informática URSA Sophisticated Loader 2020)(Citation: SCILabs Malteiro 2021)

external_references.description: Pedro Tavares (Segurança Informática). (2020, September 15). Threat analysis: The emergent URSA trojan impacts many countries using a sophisticated loader. Retrieved March 13, 2024.
SCILabs. (2021, December 23). Cyber Threat Profile Malteiro. Retrieved March 13, 2024.
